hero_sub: Experts in embroidery and printing that make a difference.
intro_title: Taking your image to the next level
intro_text: At JD ThreadInk we don't just customize garments, we create identity. With years of experience in the US market, we merge cutting-edge technology with detailed craftsmanship to deliver products that exceed expectations.
why_1_desc: We use state-of-the-art machinery for precise finishes.
why_2_desc: Threads and fabrics selected to ensure durability.
why_3_desc: We guide you from the design phase to the final product.
serv_1_desc: Ideal for uniforms, caps, and brands looking for elegance and durable relief.
serv_2_desc: Vibrant colors and complex designs captured with the best technology.
serv_3_desc: We digitize your logo and adapt your ideas to any type of garment.
cta_banner_desc: Whether for your company, your team, or your clothing brand, we have the perfect solution for you.
about_header_sub: Passion for detail in every thread.
about_essence_p1: At JD THREADINK, we understand that a garment is more than fabric; it is a canvas for expression.
about_essence_p2: We specialize in transforming abstract concepts into tangible high-end products.
mission_text: To empower brands through textile customization, ensuring quality and precision.
vision_text: To be the leading benchmark in California and the USA for innovative textile branding.
portfolio_sub: A sample of our recent work.
social_sub: Follow us or message us directly.
footer_text: Â© 2025 JD ThreadInk. All rights reserved.
